title: Personalization
description: Make it yours! Who wants a boring system?

themeSelector.title: Theme
themeSelector.desc: Choose a theme that suits your style.

themeColorSelector.title: Theme Color
themeColorSelector.desc: Choose the color that best fits your interface.

bgTempSelector.title: Background Temperature
bgTempSelector.desc: Choose a background temperature that suits your mood.

fontFamily.title: Font Style
fontFamily.desc: Choose a font that matches your preference
fontFamily.tooltip: For detailed information on all fonts, visit the Google Fonts website.

apiKey.title: Google Cloud API Key Not Found
apiKey.description: To enable this feature, please add the Google Cloud API key to your API vault.

search.title: No Font Families Found
search.description: No font families found for the given queries. Please try another one.

fontScaleSelector.title: Font Scale
fontScaleSelector.desc: Choose a font scale that suits the font family you chose.

bgImageSelector.title: Background Image
bgImageSelector.desc: Upload or search for a background image

pixabayDisabled.tooltip: To search for images from Pixabay, please add your Pixabay API key to the API vault. For more information, refer to

blur.title: Blur Effect
blur.desc: Adjust the blur level of the background image.

brightness.title: Brightness
brightness.desc: Adjust the brightness of the background image.

contrast.title: Contrast
contrast.desc: Adjust the contrast of your background image.

saturation.title: Saturation
saturation.desc: Adjust the intensity of colors in the background image.

overlayOpacity.title: Overlay Opacity
overlayOpacity.desc: Adjust the transparency of the background overlay.
